c:complexType.name: AreaChart
c:complexType.c:documentation:
The options documentation class of the Area chart.
For information on the supported data formats see .

c:property.name: point
c:property.c:documentation: The point plot is the main plot of the area chart, which means that its properties may be used without the "point" property suffix.

c:complexType.name: AreaPlot
c:complexType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the area plot.

c:property.name: stacked
c:property.c:documentation: This plot type is necessarily non-stacked.

c:property.name: areasVisible
c:property.c:documentation:
Indicates if shaded areas are shown in the plot.
This plot type necessarily shows shaded areas connecting visual elements.
